#summary ChromeVox API

= ChromeVox API =

The ChromeVox API allows web applications to interact with ChromeVox in order to provide smoother, richer auditory user interfaces.

These APIs allow web developers to make ChromeVox speak arbitrary strings of text, play earcons, and set ChromeVox's internal reading position.


= Details =

The ChromeVox API can be found here: http://code.google.com/p/google-axs-chrome/source/browse/trunk/chromevox/chromevox/injected/api.js

The following JavaScript methods are available:

  * *cvox.Api.speak(textString, queueMode, properties)*
    Speaks the given string using the specified queueMode and properties.
    _textString_ The string of text to be spoken.
    _queueMode_ Valid modes are 0 for flush; 1 for queue.
    _properties_ Speech properties to use for this utterance.
